user_not_activated: User account has not been activated
email_verification_message: Please verify your email to complete the account registration process.
password_reset_message: Here is your password reset code
password_reset_code_valid_for_10_minutes: The password reset code is valid for 10 minutes.
password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password_require_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password_require_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password_require_special: Password must contain at least one special character
default_strong_password_message: Your account has been created with a default strong password. Please log in and change your password immediately in the settings for security reasons.
missing_access_token: Missing access token in OAuth response
missing_user_info: Missing user information from OAuth provider
missing_email_google: Email information is missing from Google profile
ignore_if_not_requested: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
do_not_reply: This is an automated message, please do not reply.
api_description: cgsem.ai is an AI-powered assistant for automatic meeting note-taking and summarization. It captures key discussions, analyzes important information, and generates meeting minutes efficiently, helping users save time and enhance productivity.
no_parent_window: No parent window detected return to the login page.
please_sign_in_with_google: Please sign in with your Google account to continue.
redirecting_back: Redirecting you back to the application...
session_expired_or_invalid: Your session has expired or is invalid. Please try again.
group_invitation_subject: You're invited to join a group!
group_invitation_body_new_user: You have been invited to join the group '{group_name}'. As you are new to our platform, please register and then accept the invitation.
group_invitation_body_existing_user: You have been invited to join the group '{group_name}'. Click the button below to view and respond to your invitation.
invitation_link_alternative: If you cannot click the button, please copy and paste this link into your browser: {invitation_link}
group_invitation_ignore: If you did not expect this invitation, please ignore this email.
